properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ongerot kapkoros
Kapkoros kapkoros netilil
Iman iman Ongerot kapkoros
Iman Ongerot
kapkoros iman! x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ongerot boisiek (Ongerot),
Ongerot
kapkoros kapkoros netilil.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ongerot chepyosok (Ongerot),
Ongerot
kapkoros kapkoros netilil.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Keibe Magatiat( Ongerot),
Ongerot
kapkoros kapkoros netilil.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Keibe Divai(Ongerot),
Ongerot
kapkoros kapkoros netilil.
